content: from * to end of round cut tail and thread through remaining stitches then bring tail inside hat and weave in ears with white yarn and size 7 dpns cast on 8 10 12 stitches join to work in the round being careful not to twist row 1 - 6 k all stitches row 7 *k1 m1 k 2 3 4 m1 k1 repeat from * once more count is now 12 14 16 row 8 - 13 k all stitches row 14 *k1 m1 k 4 5 6 m1 k1 repeat from * once more count is 16 18 20 row 15 - 26 or however long you d like the ears to be k all stitches row 27 *k1 ssk k 2 3 4 k2tog k1 repeat from * once more count is 12 14 16 row 28 k all stitches row 29 *k1 ssk k 1 2 3 k2tog k1 repeat from * once more count is 8 10 12 cut yarn and pull together through remaining stitches if you d prefer a more flat look you can kitchener the remaining stitches together but that s an aesthetic choice repeat all steps for 2nd ear then attach to hat on opposite sides horizontally around where the crown decreases start tassels with mc cast on 4 stitches make a 4-stitch i-cords of approximately 12 long or whatever length you please when it is a suitable length cut mc and join cc row 1 kfb all stitches then arrange stitches on dpns to work in the round count is 8 row 2 k all stitches row 3 *k1 m1 k2 m1 k1 repeat from * once more count is 12 row 4 k all stitches row 5 *k1 m1 k4 m1 k1 repeat from * once more count is 16 row 6 k all stitches row 7 *k1 m1 k6 m1 k1 repeat from * once more count is 20 row 8 - 12 k all stitches row 13 *k1 k2tog k4 ssk k1 repeat from * once more count is 16 row 14 k all stitches row 15 *k1 k2tog k2 ssk k1 repeat from * once more count is 12 row 16 k all stitches **pause here to stuff these little puffs lightly with some polyfill raw wool or yarn scraps anything works ** row 17 k2tog all around count is 6 cut yarn and pull through remaining stitches if desired at this point you can use some of mc to to embroider some paw pads on the white puffs repeat all tassel steps to make the 2nd one then sew both into hat roughly aligned with the ears on the inside sew in all ends a nose and eyes can be added with embroidery/duplicate stitching but the hat makes plenty of impact without them so it s completely your call if you make one of these please be sure to share feedback and tag me yes you can sell any finished objects made from this pattern
